channel.title: Wanting to learn java/build a rsps
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
Im really wanting to learn java, I'm going into college next year and thinking about getting a software engineering or computer science degree. I figured i have 6-7 months to learn the hang of java, and how to learn game development.
I really want to learn to build my own RSPS, how do recommend i learn that? Thanks.

item.title: Wanting to learn java/build a rsps
item.dc:creator: @BruddaKhan BruddaKhan
item.description:
@BruddaKhan wrote:

-djjt-:

I’m only at an intermediate level of java programming, but I can teach you what I know. I’m actually in college atm pursuing a CISS degree so that might be a bit of an advantage for you. Add me on skype: djjt1234 and we’ll talk more.

Can I take you up on this offer im in the same boat. I have a little experience with python, but im currently teaching myself java and plan to start a RSPS as a project and a means of learning/experience.

Read full topic
item.source: Wanting to learn java/build a rsps

item.title: Wanting to learn java/build a rsps
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

The best place to learn Java is the official tutorials. It’s where most Java programmers start… have a look here: http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/

Read full topic
